CustomField.description: OIG maintains a list of all currently excluded individuals and entities called the List of Excluded Individuals/Entities (LEIE). Anyone who hires an individual or entity on the LEIE may be subject to civil monetary penalties (CMP).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: OIG maintains a list of all currently excluded individuals and entities called the List of Excluded Individuals/Entities (LEIE) Yes=Appears on list;,No=Not on List
CustomField.label: LEIE Exclusion Indicator
